education.degree: BS in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics and Political Science

highlights: Developed a Webex bot to streamline the initiation, monitoring, testing, and analysis of operating system builds for various network switches.
Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using a vector database and Llama 3.1.
Consolidated bug tracking and operating system test-suite data in Elasticsearch.
Prototyped new, cloud-based, extract transform load (ETL) pipeline for the Deep Space Network (DSN) Service Quality Assessment subsystem.
Shifted on-premises scripts, triggers, logging, storage, and more to Amazon Web Services.
Presented architecture to senior JPL engineers.
Engineered synchronous client/server software packages for a remote ground antenna supporting ADS-B aircraft data.
Implemented all client-server communications and complete command and control of antenna.
